get.summary: Gets an array of negative keywords, filtered by optional criteria.
get.description: **Note**: Negative keywords associated with BrandVideo ad groups are only available in v3.2 version.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Sets a zero-based offset into the requested set of negative keywords. Use in conjunction with the `count` parameter to control pagination of the returned array.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Sets the number of negative keywords in the returned array. Use in conjunction with the `startIndex` parameter to control pagination. For example, to return ...

parameters.name: matchTypeFilter
parameters.description: The returned array is filtered to include only negative keywords with `matchType` set to one of the values in the specified comma-delimited list.

parameters.name: keywordText
parameters.description: The returned array includes only negative keywords with the specified text.

parameters.name: stateFilter
parameters.description: The returned array includes only negative keywords with `state` set to the specified value.

parameters.name: campaignIdFilter
parameters.description: The returned array includes only negative keywords associated with campaigns matching those specified by identifier in the comma-delimited string.

parameters.name: adGroupIdFilter
parameters.description: The returned array includes only negative keywords associated with ad groups matching those specified by identifier in the comma-delimited string.

parameters.name: keywordIdFilter
parameters.description: The returned array includes only negative keywords with identifiers matching those specified in the comma-delimited string.

parameters.name: creativeType
parameters.description: Filter by the type of creative the campaign is associated with. To get negative keywords associated with non-video campaigns specify 'productCollection'. To ...

put.summary: Updates one or more negative keywords.
put.description: Updates one or more targeting clauses. Operation supports a maximum list size of 100 negative keywords. <bold>Note</bold> that negative keywords can be updated on campaigns where campaign's serving status is not one of `archived`, `terminated`, `rejected`, or `ended`.

keywordId.description: The identifier of the negative keyword.

adGroupId.description: The identifier of the ad group to which the negative keyword is associated.

campaignId.description: The identifier of the campaign to which the negative keyword is associated.

207.description: Multi-status. Note that the order of the return...

post.summary: Creates one or more negative keywords.
post.description: Creates one or more negative targeting clauses.

adGroupId.description: The identifier of the ad group to which the negative keyword is associated.

campaignId.description: The identifier of the campaign to which the negative keyword is associated.

keywordText.description: The keyword text. Maximum length is ten words if 'matchType' is 'negativeExact'. Maximum length is 4 words if 'matchType' is 'negativePhrase'

get.summary: Gets a negative keyword specified by identifier.

parameters.name: keywordId
parameters.description: The identifier of an existing negative keyword.

keywordId.description: The identifier of the negative keyword.

adGroupId.description: The identifier of the ad group to which the negative keyword is associated.

campaignId.description: The identifier of the campaign to which the negative keyword is associated.

keywordText.description: The keyword text. Maximum length of string is ten words if `matchType` is set to `negativeExact`. Maximum length is 4 words if `matchType` is set to `negativePhrase`.

delete.summary: Archives a negative keyword specified by identifier.
delete.description: This operation is equivalent to an update operation that sets the status field to 'archived'. Note that setting the status field to 'archived' is permanent and can't be undone. See [Developer Notes](https://advertising.amazon.com/API/docs/v2/guides/developer_notes) for more information.

parameters.name: keywordId
parameters.description: The identifier of an existing campaign.

404.description: Bad request. The specified negative keyword ide...

CreativeType.description: collection is deprecated in favor of productCollection.

adGroupId.description: The identifier of the ad group associated with the keyword.

campaignId.description: The identifier of the campaign associated with the keyword.

keywordText.description: The keyword text. The maximum number of words for this string is 10.

description.description: A human-readable description of the enumerated response code in the `code` field.

SBNegativeKeywordState.description: The current state of the negative keyword.

NegativeMatchType.description: The negative match type. For more information, see [negative keyword match types](https://advertising.amazon.com/help#GHTRFDZRJPW6764R) in the Amazon Ads support center.

oauth2AuthorizationCode.description: Login with Amazon. For more information see [Login with Amazon authorization code grant](https://developer.amazon.com/docs/login-with-amazon/authorization-code-grant.html).

scopes.cpc_advertising:campaign_management: Modify your advertising campaigns and access performance data
